ovdesc.p: This file holds the details of TODAY's passbook updates. It records the last STMT.ENTRY.ID and the last balance entered on the passbook.

It is only applicable for TODAY's entries and is cleared during the end of day procedure when the ACCOUNT.STATEMENT & associated files are updated - see batch process TELLER.PASSBOOK.STMT. The update of a passbook is viewed by the system in the same way as the production of a statement.

desc.p: The passbook account which has been updated.
Holds the last balance printed on the passbook today.
Holds the last statement entry id to be printed on the passbook today.
